mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES(seq_reply.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyregdate, replymoddate, adoption FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX(tbl_reply pk_reply) */ rownum rn, rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyregdate, replymoddate, adoption FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(adoption) FROM tbl_reply WHERE (bno = #{bno}) AND adoption IS NOT NULL
